snippet: A large study found that getting the shot during pregnancy was not associated with an increased risk of fetal death and reduced the risk of the mother getting the flu by about 70 percent.
lead_paragraph: A large study found that getting the shot during pregnancy was not associated with an increased risk of fetal death and reduced the risk of the mother getting the flu by about 70 percent.

headline.seo: Study Confirms Benefits of Flu Vaccine for Pregnant Women
headline.main: Study Confirms Benefits of Flu Vaccine for Pregnant Women
